javadoc: Manage the set of trees in the program.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addrMap
params.comment: map to convert addresses to longs and longs to addresses

params.name: openMode
params.comment: the open mode for the program.

throws.comment: if a database io error occurs.
if the database version is different from the expected version

methods.name: createRootModule
methods.comment: Create a new tree with given name.

params.name: treeName
params.comment: name of the tree (not the root module)

throws.comment:
if there is already tree named
 treeName

return.comment: root module for the new tree

methods.name: getRootModule
methods.comment: Get the root module of the tree with the given name.

return.comment:
root module, or null if there is no tree with the
 given name

methods.javadoc:
Returns the root module for the default program tree. The default tree is the oldest tree.
@return the root module for the default program tree. The default tree is the oldest tree.
methods.name: getDefaultRootModule
methods.comment: Returns the root module for the default program tree. The default tree is the oldest tree.

return.comment: the root module for the default program tree. The default tree is the oldest tree.

methods.javadoc:
Get the names of all the trees in the program.
@return sorted array of tree names
methods.name: getTreeNames
methods.comment: Get the names of all the trees in the program.

methods.name: renameTree
methods.comment:
Rename the tree to the new name. This method has no effect on the
 name of the root module.

throws.comment:
if newName exists as the name
 for another root

methods.javadoc:
Remove the tree with the given name.
@return true if the tree was removed
methods.name: removeTree
methods.comment: Remove the tree with the given name.

return.comment: true if the tree was removed

methods.name: getModule
methods.comment:
Get the module with the given name that is in the tree identified
 by the treeName.

return.comment: null if there is no module with the given name in the tree

methods.name: getFragment
methods.comment:
Get the fragment with the given name that is in the tree identified
 by the treeName.

params.name: name
params.comment: name of fragment to look for

return.comment: null if there is no fragment with the given name in the tree

methods.name: getFragment
methods.comment:
Get the fragment that contains the given address within the tree
 identified by the treeName.

return.comment:
fragment containing addr, or null if addr does not
 exist in memory

methods.javadoc: Add a memory block with the given range.
methods.name: addMemoryBlock
methods.comment: Add a memory block with the given range.

methods.javadoc:
Remove a memory block with the given range
@throws CancelledException
methods.name: deleteAddressRange
methods.comment: Remove a memory block with the given range

methods.name: moveAddressRange
methods.comment: Move a memory block to new place.

methods.name: getRootModule
methods.comment: Get the root module for the tree that has the given ID.

name: TreeManager
comment: Manage the set of trees in the program.

fields.javadoc: The name of the default tree that is created when a program is created.
fields.name: DEFAULT_TREE_NAME
fields.comment: The name of the default tree that is created when a program is created.
